home.title: Etherith
home.subtitle: Preserving ancestral memories, stories, and cultural heritage for future generations
home.description: Join us in protecting what makes our communities unique and valuable

culturalPreservation.title: Cultural Preservation
culturalPreservation.description: Safeguard ancestral memories and cultural stories from being lost or appropriated. Our platform ensures your heritage remains protected for generations.

aiEnhancedMemory.title: AI-Enhanced Memory
aiEnhancedMemory.description: Leverage artificial intelligence to intelligently organize and preserve memories with rich metadata and cultural context recognition.

ipfsStorage.title: IPFS Storage
ipfsStorage.description: Permanent, decentralized storage on the IPFS network via Pinata ensures your memories are preserved forever, beyond any single platform.

mission.title: More Than Technology
mission.subtitle: A Cultural Movement
mission.description: Etherith represents a cultural movement to reclaim and preserve our collective heritage. In a world where cultural appropriation and erasure are rampant, we provide the tools needed to protect what makes our communities unique.
